title: Deadly Current
description: In this Dateline classic, an atheist and a born-again preacher set out on the project of their lives, but no one thought that Satan might come a long for the ride. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on August 20, 2010.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
